title: right-facing fist: dark skin tone

nouns: The raised fist is a symbol of solidarity and support.
Hand with the fingers curled into the palm
The closed hand with the fingers on the palm.
A fist is an action where a hand has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles.
A hand that has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles
Hand with the fingers clenched or curled inward
A hand with the fingers clenched in the palm (as for hitting)

description: This version of the  Right-facing Fist emoji has the  Dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Black Skin Tone on supported platf
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the right-facing fist with a dark skin tone is depicted with a powerful, solid form, emphasizing strength and solidarity. Its smooth, rounded knuckles and the subtle gloss from Apple's realistic lighting create a tangible, impactful presence. This emoji, rendered with Apple's characteristic attention to detail, conveys determination, support, or a strong affirmation, often used to show unity or a powerful message.
